p: The neutrophilia observed in this study could be connected with the daily administration of high dose of the extract, as a source of stress as noninfectious conditions including malignancy, chemical intoxication, and metabolic intoxication (uremia) usually stimulate stress reaction and could lead to neutrophilia. The increase but non-significant (P > 0.05) changes in RBC, PCV, Hb, WBC count and differential WBC count suggest that the extract could influences haematopoiesis pathway without cellular inflammatory process.
